<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ogre Glutton](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3119)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Ogre gluttons take the act of feeding to a horrific extreme, capable of extending their already cavernous mouths wide enough to gulp down a halfling. Stories of ogre gluttons being tricked into eating razor-edged shields or barrels filled with poisoned meat are common, but such tales are of little consolation to those who have been gobbled whole by these ravenous giants. In addition to their sadistic table manners, ogre gluttons have a disturbing knack for coming up with  violent “games” that are little more than drawn-out torments, yet those who somehow manage to beat a glutton at the rules of their own game can often enrage the ogre enough that the resulting tantrum provides an opportunity for the captives to escape.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Ogre Glutton](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3119)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Giant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=616" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 250 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +10, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** -1

**Con** +4

**Int** -2

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 70

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greataxe +14 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d12+8 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +14,
**Damage** 1d8+8 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45) and glutton's feast

**Glutton's Feast**   If the ogre glutton damages a living creature with their jaws Strike, they gain 1d4 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute.

**Glutton's Rush** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The ogre glutton Strides twice and makes a jaws Strike. If they damage a living creature with this Strike, the temporary Hit Points they receive from glutton's feast is increased to 2d4.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=77)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Small, 2d4+4 bludgeoning, Rupture 14

</column>
